page.title: 18River Ouse <1>
page.content: The river, which meanders through town from Brakley Road to Stratford Road, is going to be subject to new landscaping and {flood prevention schemes. This is because the Anglian Water Authorities intend to{deepen}and alter the shape of the river. The landscaping operation is to be carefully watched by the Aylesbury Vale District Council (AVDC).Old trees will be taken out, footbridges will be rebuilt and new wears made. There will also be a path following the{river's {course} so that people can walk along the river bank from Bridge St. to the bridge on Stratford Fields. Councillor,{Hedley Cadd}thinks that all of the landscaping shouldn't be started until all the flood prevention are finished because if it is put in before it may be{ruined by floods.
